      Accessor :
      Precondition :color must be one of the colors of the game

      Transformer:

      Postcondition :adds 1 destination cards on the player hands
      void Deck.getNewTrainCard(Player p)
      Transformer:

      Postcondition :adds 2 or 1 train cards on the player hands
